attributes.action: include medical exemption from precription charges for all people who have incontinence appliances because of illness or diability
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently if you need continence appliances you can have free prescriptions if your disability prevents you from leaving the home without assistance or if you have a stoma eg for urostomy, ileostomy and colostomy.  This excludes people such as those with Spina Bifida who use other kinds of continence appliances. Such categories used to be exempt.
